features.title: EXPERTS IN CUSTOM WEB DEVELOPMENT
features.description: Does your website truly reflect what your business needs? At KodeWave, we create modern, customized web solutions tailored to your goals. We use technologies like React.js, Next.js, Astro, and more to deliver fast, scalable, and easy-to-maintain experiences.

casos.title: Success Stories: Results that speak for themselves
casos.subtitle: Each project is a different story. These are some companies and professionals who trusted KodeWave to transform their digital presence.

dental.name: SmileCare Dental Clinic
dental.challenge: They needed a faster and easier-to-use website to increase online appointments.
dental.solution: We migrated to Next.js and optimized local SEO with schema markup and strategic content.

electronics.name: Electro Plus Store
electronics.challenge: High cart abandonment and confusing mobile shopping experience.
electronics.solution: We redesigned the checkout flow, integrated WhatsApp, and optimized images.

law.name: Martínez Legal Consulting
law.challenge: Outdated site that didn't generate trust or inquiries.
law.solution: Professional landing with success stories, verified testimonials, and optimized form.

about.title: We are KodeWave Solutions
about.subtitle: We create software, we build trust. Our mission is for every business, regardless of size, to have a digital presence that inspires, sells, and evolves.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: We help entrepreneurs, clinics, and companies transform their ideas into functional digital solutions. We focus on technical quality, user experience, and real impact on every project.
vision.paragraph2: We don't sell generic templates. Each project is unique, designed and developed specifically for your business goals.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer your most common questions

q1.question: How long does a project take?
q1.answer: It depends on the scope, but a standard website takes 2-4 weeks. Simple landing pages can be ready in 5-7 days.

q2.question: Costs and payment methods?
q2.answer: We offer personalized quotes according to your needs. We accept payments in phases: 50% at start, 50% at completion.

q3.question: Maintenance and support?
q3.answer: We include 30 days of free post-launch support. After that, we offer monthly maintenance plans starting at $50.

q4.question: Code ownership and hosting?
q4.answer: The code is 100% yours. We help you with hosting on Vercel (free) or the platform you prefer.

q5.question: Can you migrate from Wix/WordPress?
q5.answer: Yes, we migrate your content to modern technologies while maintaining your SEO and significantly improving performance.
